column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Kim - Thank you so much for the 5-star review. We love to read reviews like yours that are personal and ultra-specific. We understand that we're never going to be all things to all people
column2: but every once in a while we hit the bullseye with some folks
column4: it truly makes all the hard work and physical effort that goes into running our restaurant worthwhile. Thanks again.
